sourcesContent: Object.defineProperty(exports,"__esModule",{value:true});exports.default=componentsReducer;var _constants=require('../constants');function _toConsumableArray(arr){if(Array.isArray(arr)){for(var i=0,arr2=Array(arr.length);i<arr.length;i++){arr2[i]=arr[i];}return arr2;}else{return Array.from(arr);}}function componentsReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:[];var action=arguments[1];if(action.type===_constants.ADD_COMPONENT){return[].concat(_toConsumableArray(state),[action.component]);}else if(action.type===_constants.REMOVE_COMPONENT){return state.filter(function(element){return element!==action.component;});}return state;}
